verses.name: James 4:5
verses.text: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain, The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy?

verses.name: James 4:6
verses.text: But he giveth more grace. Wherefore he saith, God resisteth the proud, but giveth grace unto the humble.

verses.name: James 4:7
verses.text: Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

verses.name: James 4:8
verses.text: Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you. Cleanse your hands, ye sinners; and purify your hearts, ye double minded.

verses.name: James 4:9
verses.text: Be afflicted, and mourn, and weep: let your laughter be turned to mourning, and your joy to heaviness.
